$description: D&D 5e 2024 spells (391 total). Generated from reference/seeding/spells.md.

data.name: Acid Splash
data.description: 1d6 Acid damage to 1 or 2 creatures within 5ft of each other (Dex save)

data.name: Aid
data.description: Increase HP maximum and current HP by 5 for up to 3 creatures

data.name: Alarm
data.description: Set a mental or audible alarm triggered by Tiny or larger creatures entering the area

data.name: Alter Self
data.description: Choose one: Aquatic Adaptation (breathe water/swim speed), Change Appearance, or Natural Weapons (1d6 damage)

data.name: Animal Friendship
data.description: Target beast with Int < 4 must succeed on a Wis save or be Charmed by you

data.name: Animal Messenger
data.description: Send a Tiny beast to a location you describe to deliver a 25-word message

data.name: Animal Shapes
data.description: Transform any number of willing creatures into Large or smaller beasts (CR 4 or lower)

data.name: Animate Dead

components.material_description: a drop of blood; a piece of flesh; and a pinch of bone dust

data.description: Create a Skeleton or Zombie from a pile of bones or a corpse

data.name: Animate Objects
data.description: Animate up to 10 objects to fight for you; objects have stats based on size (Tiny to Huge)

data.name: Antilife Shell
data.description: 10ft radius hemisphere prevents living creatures from entering

data.name: Antimagic Field
data.description: 10ft radius sphere where spells cannot be cast and magic items become mundane

data.name: Antipathy/sympathy

components.material_description: a mix of vinegar and honey

data.description: Target object/creature attracts or repels a specific kind of intelligent creature

data.name: Arcane Eye
data.description: Create an invisible, floating 1-inch eye that you can see through and move 30ft

data.name: Arcane Gate
data.description: Create two linked teleportation portals within 500ft of each other

data.name: Arcane Lock

components.material_description: gold dust worth 25+ GP which the spell consumes

data.description: Lock a door or container; adds +10 to the DC to break/force it; only you/designated users can pass

data.name: Arcane Vigor
data.description: You regain 2d8 + Spellcasting Mod Hit Points

data.name: Armor Of Agathys
data.description: Gain 5 Temp HP. While active, attackers hitting you with melee take 5 Cold damage

data.name: Arms Of Hadar
data.description: 2d6 Necrotic damage in a 10ft radius; targets cannot take Reactions on a failed Str save

data.name: Astral Projection

components.material_description: for each target one jacinth worth 1000+ GP and one silver bar worth 100+ GP which the spell consumes

data.description: Project your astral form and up to 8 others into the Astral Plane

data.name: Augury

components.material_description: specially marked sticks; bones; cards; or other divinatory tokens worth 25+ GP

data.description: Receive an omen (Weal, Woe, Both, or Neither) regarding a course of action within 30 mins

data.name: Aura Of Life
data.description: 30ft aura; allies have resistance to Necrotic damage; HP max cannot be reduced; 0 HP allies regain 1 HP

data.name: Aura Of Purity
data.description: 30ft aura; allies are immune to disease and have Advantage on saves vs. many conditions (Blind, Charmed, etc.)

data.name: Aura Of Vitality
data.description: 30ft aura; as a Bonus Action, you can heal one creature in the aura for 2d6 HP

data.name: Awaken

components.material_description: an agate worth 1000+ GP which the spell consumes

data.description: Give a beast or plant Int 10 and the ability to speak one language

data.name: Bane
data.description: Up to 3 targets subtract 1d4 from attack rolls and saving throws (Wis save)

data.name: Banishing Smite
data.description: Next hit deals +5d10 Force damage. If target has < 50 HP, it is Banished

data.name: Banishment
data.description: Target sent to another plane (Charisma save). If native to another plane, it doesn't return

data.name: Barkskin
data.description: Target's AC cannot be lower than 16

data.name: Beacon Of Hope
data.description: Allies gain Advantage on Wis and Death saves; they regain maximum possible HP from healing

data.name: Beast Sense
data.description: See and hear through the senses of a willing beast

data.name: Befuddlement

components.material_description: a key ring with no keys

data.description: Targetâ€™s Int and Cha scores become 1; target cannot cast spells or activate magic items

data.name: Bestow Curse
data.description: Choose: Disadvantage on ability saves, Disadvantage on attacks vs you, wasted actions, or +1d8 Necrotic damage

data.name: Bigby's Hand
data.description: Create a Large hand to Clench, Forceful Hand (push), Grasping Hand (grapple), or Interposing Hand (cover)

data.name: Blade Barrier
data.description: Create a wall of whirling blades dealing 6d10 Slashing damage (Dex save)

data.name: Blade Ward
data.description: Gain Resistance against Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage from weapon attacks

data.name: Bless
data.description: Up to 3 targets add 1d4 to attack rolls and saving throws

data.name: Blight
data.description: 8d8 Necrotic damage (Con save). Plants have Disadvantage and take max damage

data.name: Blinding Smite
data.description: Next hit deals +3d8 Radiant damage and target is Blinded (Con save)

data.name: Blindness/deafness
data.description: Target is Blinded or Deafened (Con save)

data.name: Blink
data.description: 50% chance each turn to vanish into the Ethereal Plane, returning at the start of your next turn

data.name: Blur
data.description: Attackers have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you

data.name: Burning Hands
data.description: 3d6 Fire damage in a 15ft cone (Dex save)

data.name: Call Lightning
data.description: Call down a bolt dealing 3d10 Lightning damage in a 5ft radius (Dex save); repeatable each turn

data.name: Calm Emotions
data.description: Suppress Charmed/Frightened effects or make a group of humanoids indifferent (Wis save)

data.name: Chain Lightning
data.description: 10d8 Lightning damage to a target and up to 3 secondary targets within 30ft of it

data.name: Charm Monster
data.description: Target creature is Charmed by you for 1 hour; Advantage on save if you are fighting it

data.name: Charm Person
data.description: Target humanoid is Charmed by you for 1 hour

data.name: Chill Touch
data.description: 1d8 Necrotic damage; target cannot regain HP until your next turn. Undead have Disadvantage on attacks vs you

data.name: Chromatic Orb
data.description: 3d8 damage of a type you choose (Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Poison, or Thunder)

data.name: Circle Of Death

components.material_description: powder of a crushed black pearl worth 500+ GP

data.description: 8d6 Necrotic damage in a massive 60ft radius sphere (Con save)

data.name: Circle Of Power
data.description: 30ft aura; allies have Advantage on saves vs. spells; take no damage on successful saves for half-damage spells

data.name: Clairvoyance
data.description: Create an invisible sensor to see or hear a familiar location up to 1 mile away

data.name: Clone

components.material_description: diamond worth 1000+ GP and a vessel worth 2000+ GP

data.description: Grow a duplicate body in a vessel; your soul transfers to it if you die

data.name: Cloud Kill
data.description: 5d8 Poison damage in a 20ft sphere; heavily obscures area and moves 10ft away each turn

data.name: Cloud Of Daggers
data.description: 4d4 Slashing damage to any creature that enters or starts its turn in a 5ft cube

data.name: Color Spray
data.description: 6d10 HP worth of creatures in a 15ft cone are Blinded

data.name: Command
data.description: Force a target to follow a one-word command (e.g., Drop, Flee, Grovel) on a failed Wis save

data.name: Commune
data.description: Contact a deity to ask 3 "Yes" or "No" questions

data.name: Commune With Nature
data.description: Gain knowledge of the surrounding territory (water, plants, minerals, etc.)

data.name: Compelled Duel
data.description: Target has Disadvantage on attacks vs others; must make Wis save to move more than 30ft from you

data.name: Comprehend Languages

components.material_description: a pinch of soot and salt

data.description: Understand the literal meaning of any spoken or written language you see/hear

data.name: Compulsion
data.description: Force targets to move in a direction of your choice on their turns (Wis save)

data.name: Cone Of Cold
data.description: 8d8 Cold damage in a 60ft cone (Con save)

data.name: Confusion
data.description: Targets in 10ft radius act randomly (e.g., do nothing, move randomly, attack nearest) on failed Wis save

data.name: Conjure Animals
data.description: Summon fey spirits in the form of beasts (e.g., 1 CR 2, 2 CR 1, etc.)

data.name: Conjure Barrage
data.description: Throw a weapon/ammo to create a 60ft cone dealing 3d8 damage of the weapon's type

data.name: Conjure Celestial
data.description: Summon a celestial (CR 4 or lower) that disappears if it drops to 0 HP

data.name: Conjure Elemental
data.description: Summon an elemental (CR 5 or lower) from a source of that element

data.name: Conjure Fey
data.description: Summon a fey creature (CR 6 or lower)

data.name: Conjure Minor Elementals
data.description: Summon minor elementals (e.g., 1 CR 2, 2 CR 1, etc.)

data.name: Conjure Volley

components.material_description: a Melee or Ranged weapon worth at least 1 CP

data.description: Create a 20ft radius, 40ft high cylinder of ammo dealing 8d8 damage (Dex save)

data.name: Conjure Woodland Beings
data.description: Summon fey creatures (e.g., 1 CR 2, 2 CR 1, etc.)

data.name: Contact Other Plane
data.description: Ask 5 questions to an extraplanar entity; failed Int save deals 6d6 Psychic and makes you insane

data.name: Contagion
data.description: On 3 failed Con saves, target is afflicted with a disease (e.g., Blinding Sickness, Filth Fever)

data.name: Contingency
data.description: Set a "trigger" for another spell (lvl 5 or lower) to cast itself on you automatically

data.name: Continual Flame
data.description: Create a permanent, heatless torch-like flame

data.name: Control Water

components.material_description: a mixture of water and dust

data.description: Control a large body of water: Flood, Part Water, Redirect, or Whirlpool

data.name: Control Weather
data.description: Change precipitation, temperature, and wind over several hours

data.name: Cordon Of Arrows
data.description: Set 4 pieces of ammo as a trap; they fire automatically at enemies for 1d6 Piercing

data.name: Counterspell
data.description: Attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell

data.name: Create Food And Water
data.description: Create 45 lbs of food and 30 gallons of water

data.name: Create Or Destroy Water

components.material_description: a mix of water and sand

data.description: Create 10 gallons of water or destroy an equivalent amount or a 30ft fog cloud

data.name: Create Undead

components.material_description: one 150+ GP black onyx stone for each corpse

data.description: Animate up to 3 corpses into Ghouls

data.name: Creation
data.description: Create a non-living object of vegetable, mineral, or precious metal for a limited time

data.name: Crown Of Madness
data.description: Target humanoid is Charmed and must attack a creature of your choice (Wis save)

data.name: Crusader's Mantle
data.description: 30ft aura; allies deal an extra 1d4 Radiant damage on weapon hits

data.name: Cure Wounds
data.description: Heal a creature you touch for 1d8 + Spellcasting Mod

data.name: Dancing Lights
data.description: Create 4 torch-sized lights that you can move as a Bonus Action

data.name: Darkness

components.material_description: bat fur and a piece of coal

data.description: Create a 15ft radius sphere of magical darkness that blocks Darkvision

data.name: Darkvision
data.description: Touch a creature to give it Darkvision out to 60ft

data.name: Daylight
data.description: Create a 60ft radius of bright light (sheds dim light for another 60ft); dispels magical darkness

data.name: Death Ward
data.description: If the target drops to 0 HP, it drops to 1 HP instead and the spell ends

data.name: Delayed Blast Fireball

components.material_description: a ball of bat guano and sulfur

data.description: Create a bead that deals 12d6 Fire damage; damage increases by 1d6 every round it is not detonated

data.name: Demiplane
data.description: Create a door to a 30ft empty room on another plane

data.name: Destructive Wave
data.description: 5d6 Thunder and 5d6 Radiant (or Necrotic) damage; targets knocked Prone (Con save)

data.name: Detect Evil And Good
data.description: Detect the presence and location of Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, Aberrations, or Undead

data.name: Detect Magic
data.description: Sense the presence of magic within 30ft and see an aura around magical objects/creatures

data.name: Detect Poison And Disease
data.description: Sense the presence and type of poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases within 30ft

data.name: Detect Thoughts
data.description: Read surface thoughts or probe deeper (Wis save) into a creature's mind

data.name: Dimension Door
data.description: Teleport yourself and one other creature up to 500ft to a spot you can see or describe

data.name: Disguise Self
data.description: Change your appearance (including height/weight slightly) for 1 hour

data.name: Disintegrate
data.description: 10d6 + 40 Force damage. If target drops to 0 HP, it and its gear turn to dust (Dex save)

data.name: Dispel Evil And Good
data.description: Protection from extraplanar creatures; or break a charm/fright/possession; or banish a creature

data.name: Dispel Magic
data.description: End spell effects of 3rd level or lower on a target; higher levels require an ability check

data.name: Dissonant Whispers
data.description: 3d6 Psychic damage; target must move away from you immediately (Wis save)

data.name: Divination

components.material_description: incense worth 25+ GP which the spell consumes

data.description: Ask a single question about a specific goal/event to occur within 7 days and get a truthful reply

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: Your weapon attacks deal an extra 1d4 Radiant damage

data.name: Divine Smite
data.description: Spend a spell slot to deal an extra 2d8 Radiant damage (+1d8 vs Undead/Fiends)

data.name: Divine Word
data.description: Utter a word that harms creatures based on HP: < 50 HP (Deafened), < 40 HP (Blinded/Deafened), etc.

data.name: Dominate Beast
data.description: Take total control of a beast (Wis save); can issue commands telepathically

data.name: Dominate Monster
data.description: Take total control of any creature (Wis save); can issue commands telepathically

data.name: Dominate Person
data.description: Take total control of a humanoid (Wis save); can issue commands telepathically

data.name: Dragon's Breath
data.description: Target can use an Action to exhale a 15ft cone of energy (3d6 damage)

data.name: Drawmji's Instant Summons
data.description: Teleport a specially prepared object directly to your hand from anywhere

data.name: Dream
data.description: Enter the dreams of a creature you know to deliver a message or cause nightmares (3d6 Psychic)

data.name: Druidcraft
data.description: Create minor nature effects (predict weather, bloom flowers, light/snuff small fires)

data.name: Earthquake
data.description: Create intense tremors; structures take 50 damage; creatures may fall into fissures or be knocked Prone

data.name: Eldritch Blast
data.description: 1d10 Force damage; fires additional beams at levels 5, 11, and 17

data.name: Elementalism
data.description: Control/create small elemental effects (dust, fire, water, or air)

data.name: Elemental Weapon
data.description: Weapon becomes magical, +1 to attack, and deals +1d4 elemental damage (choose type)

data.name: Enhance Ability
data.description: Grant Advantage on checks with one ability (Str, Dex, etc.) and other minor perks

data.name: Enlarge/reduce
data.description: Change a creatureâ€™s size: Enlarge (+1d4 damage, Adv on Str) or Reduce (-1d4 damage, Disadv on Str)

data.name: Ensnaring Strike
data.description: Next hit creates vines; target is Restrained and takes 1d6 Piercing each turn (Str save)

data.name: Entangle
data.description: Grasping weeds in a 20ft square make area difficult terrain and Restrain targets (Str save)

data.name: Enthrall
data.description: Distract a group of creatures; they have Disadvantage on Perception checks to see anyone but you

data.name: Etherealness
data.description: Step into the Ethereal Plane for up to 8 hours; move through walls and objects

data.name: Evard's Black Tentacles
data.description: 3d6 Bludgeoning damage in a 20ft square; area is difficult terrain and Restrains targets

data.name: Expeditious Retreat
data.description: You can take the Dash action as a Bonus Action for the duration

data.name: Eyebite
data.description: Use an action each turn to choose: Asleep, Panicked, or Sickened (Poisoned) on a target

data.name: Fabricate
data.description: Convert raw materials into a finished product (e.g., trees into a bridge, flax into cloth)

data.name: Faerie Fire
data.description: Objects/creatures in 20ft cube glow; attack rolls against them have Advantage (Dex save)

data.name: False Life
data.description: Gain 1d4 + 4 Temporary Hit Points

data.name: Fear
data.description: Targets in 30ft cone are Frightened and must take the Dash action to run away (Wis save)

data.name: Feather Fall

components.material_description: a small feather or piece of down

data.description: Up to 5 falling creatures slow their descent to 60ft per round and take no falling damage

data.name: Feign Death
data.description: Target enters a cataleptic state indistinguishable from death; gain Resistance to all damage except Psychic

data.name: Find Familiar

components.material_description: burning incense worth 10+ GP which the spell consumes

data.description: Summon a spirit in the form of an animal to act as a scout and deliver touch spells

data.name: Find Steed
data.description: Summon a loyal spirit in the form of a horse or other mount

data.name: Find The Path

components.material_description: a set of divination tools such as cards or runes worth 100+ GP

data.description: Find the shortest, most direct physical route to a specific fixed location you know

data.name: Find Traps
data.description: Sense the presence of any trap within line of sight (120ft)

data.name: Finger Of Death
data.description: 7d8 + 30 Necrotic damage. A humanoid killed by this rises as a permanent Zombie

data.name: Fireball

components.material_description: a ball of bat guano and sulfur

data.description: 8d6 Fire damage in a 20ft radius sphere (Dex save)

data.name: Fire Bolt
data.description: 1d10 Fire damage; ranged spell attack

data.name: Fire Shield

components.material_description: a bit of phosphorus or a firefly

data.description: Choose Warm or Chill; gain resistance to Cold or Fire; attackers take 2d8 damage when hitting you

data.name: Fire Storm
data.description: 7d10 Fire damage in up to ten 10ft cubes (Dex save)

data.name: Flame Blade
data.description: Create a fiery blade that deals 3d6 Fire damage on a melee spell attack

data.name: Flame Strike
data.description: 4d6 Fire and 4d6 Radiant damage in a 10ft radius cylinder (Dex save)

data.name: Flaming Sphere
data.description: 2d6 Fire damage; move the sphere up to 30ft as a Bonus Action to ram targets

data.name: Flesh To Stone
data.description: Target Restrained and gradually turns to stone (petrified) on failed Con saves

data.name: Fly
data.description: Target gains a flying speed of 60ft

data.name: Fog Cloud
data.description: Create a 20ft radius sphere of fog that heavily obscures the area

data.name: Forbiddance
data.description: Wards up to 40k sq ft against planar travel; deals 5d10 Radiant or Necrotic to specified creatures

data.name: Forcecage

components.material_description: ruby dust worth 1,500+ GP which the spell consumes

data.description: Trap a creature in an invisible box or cage of force; cannot be dispelled by Dispel Magic

data.name: Foresight
data.description: Target cannot be surprised; has Advantage on all rolls; others have Disadvantage to hit target

data.name: Fount Of Moonlight
data.description: Gain resistance to Radiant damage; deal +2d6 Radiant on hits; shed light

data.name: Freedom Of Movement
data.description: Target's movement is not affected by difficult terrain, spells, or being underwater

data.name: Friends
data.description: Gain Advantage on Charisma checks against a non-hostile creature; target becomes hostile later

data.name: Gaseous Form
data.description: Target becomes a misty cloud with fly speed; can pass through small holes; has resistance to damage

data.name: Gate
data.description: Open a portal to a specific location or person on another plane

data.name: Geas
data.description: Command a creature to perform a task or refrain from an action; takes 5d10 Psychic if it disobeys

data.name: Gentle Repose
data.description: Prevents a corpse from decaying or being turned into undead; extends time limit for resurrection

data.name: Giant Insect
data.description: Transform normal insects into giant versions (e.g., Giant Spider, Giant Scorpion) under your control

data.name: Glibness
data.description: Any Charisma check you make with a die roll of 14 or lower is treated as a 15

data.name: Globe Of Invulnerability
data.description: 10ft radius sphere; spells of 5th level or lower cannot affect anything inside

data.name: Glyph Of Warding

components.material_description: powdered diamond worth 200+ GP (which the spell consumes

data.description: Create a trap that triggers a 20ft explosion (5d8 damage) or a stored spell when touched

data.name: Goodberry
data.description: Create 10 berries; each restores 1 HP and provides nourishment for a full day

data.name: Grasping Vine
data.description: Conjure a vine that can pull a creature 20ft toward it as a Bonus Action (Dex save)

data.name: Grease

components.material_description: a bit of pork rind or butter

data.description: 10ft square of grease makes area difficult terrain; creatures must make Dex save or fall Prone

data.name: Greater Invisibility
data.description: Target becomes invisible for 1 min; does not end if the target attacks or casts spells

data.name: Greater Restoration

components.material_description: diamond dust worth 100+ GP (which the spell consumes

data.description: End one effect: Exhaustion, Charm/Petrify, Curse, Ability reduction, or HP max reduction

data.name: Guardian Of Faith
data.description: Spectral guardian occupies a space; deals 20 Radiant damage to enemies that come near it

data.name: Guards And Wards

components.material_description: a silver rod worth 10+ GP (which the spell consumes

data.description: Create complex wards: fog, locked doors, webs, and stinking vapors in a large area

data.name: Guidance
data.description: Target adds 1d4 to one ability check of its choice

data.name: Guiding Bolt
data.description: 4d6 Radiant damage; next attack roll against target has Advantage

data.name: Gust Of Wind
data.description: Create a 60ft line of wind that pushes creatures 15ft away and makes movement difficult

data.name: Hail Of Thorns
data.description: Next ranged hit causes a rain of thorns; 1d10 Piercing damage to target and nearby creatures

data.name: Hallow

components.material_description: incense worth 1,000+ GP (which the spell consumes

data.description: Ward an area against specific creature types and apply an extra effect (e.g., Courage, Fear, Silence)

data.name: Hallucinatory Terrain
data.description: Make an area look, sound, and smell like some other sort of natural terrain

data.name: Harm
data.description: Target takes 14d6 Necrotic damage and its HP max is reduced by the same amount (Con save)

data.name: Haste
data.description: Target's speed doubles, +2 AC, Adv on Dex saves, and gains an additional Action each turn

data.name: Heal
data.description: Target regains 70 Hit Points and is cured of Blindness, Deafness, and all diseases

data.name: Healing Word
data.description: Regain 1d4 + Spellcasting Mod HP; Bonus Action and 60ft range

data.name: Heat Metal

components.material_description: a piece of iron and a flame

data.description: 2d8 Fire damage to a creature in contact with metal; creature has Disadvantage on rolls

data.name: Hellish Rebuke
data.description: Reaction to taking damage; deals 2d10 Fire damage to the attacker (Dex save)

data.name: Heroes' Feast
data.description: Feast for 12; cures disease, gives immunity to Poison/Fright, and increases HP max by 2d10

data.name: Heroism
data.description: Target is immune to being Frightened and gains Temporary HP equal to your mod each turn

data.name: Hex
data.description: Deal extra 1d6 Necrotic on hits; choose one ability for target to have Disadvantage on checks

data.name: Hold Monster
data.description: Target is Paralyzed (Wis save); repeat save at the end of each turn

data.name: Hold Person
data.description: Target humanoid is Paralyzed (Wis save); repeat save at the end of each turn

data.name: Holy Aura
data.description: 30ft aura; allies have Advantage on all saves; attackers have Disadvantage to hit them

data.name: Hunger Of Hadar
data.description: 20ft sphere of blackness; 2d6 Cold at start of turn, 2d6 Acid at end (blinded inside)

data.name: Hunter's Mark
data.description: Deal extra 1d6 damage on hits; gain Advantage on tracking the target

data.name: Hypnotic Pattern
data.description: Creatures in 30ft cube are Incapacitated and their speed is 0 (Wis save)

data.name: Ice Knife
data.description: 1d10 Piercing to target, then it explodes for 2d6 Cold in a 5ft radius (Dex save)

data.name: Ice Storm
data.description: 2d8 Bludgeoning and 4d6 Cold in a 20ft radius; area becomes difficult terrain

data.name: Identify
data.description: Learn the properties and attunement requirements of a magic item or the effects of a spell

data.name: Illusory Script
data.description: Write a message that is only readable by you and specific people you designate

data.name: Imprisonment
data.description: Target is trapped in one of several states (Burial, Chaining, Slumber, etc.) until dispelled

data.name: Incendiary Cloud
data.description: 10d8 Fire damage in a 20ft sphere; cloud is heavily obscured and moves 10ft each turn

data.name: Inflict Wounds
data.description: 3d10 Necrotic damage; melee spell attack

data.name: Insect Plague
data.description: 4d10 Piercing damage in a 20ft radius sphere; area is lightly obscured and difficult terrain

data.name: Invisibility
data.description: Target becomes invisible for 1 hour; ends if target attacks or casts a spell

data.name: Jallarzi's Storm Of Radiance
data.description: Targets are Blinded and Deafened; take 2d10 Radiant and 2d10 Thunder (Con save)

data.name: Jump
data.description: Target's jump distance is tripled for 1 minute

data.name: Knock
data.description: Open an object that is stuck, barred, or locked; audible for 300ft

data.name: Legend Lore
data.description: Learn significant information/stories about a person, place, or object of importance

data.name: Leomund's Secret Chest
data.description: Hide a chest in the Ethereal Plane and summon it back to you as an action

data.name: Leomund's Tiny Hut
data.description: Create an immobile 10ft dome that blocks spells and weather; you and 9 others can fit

data.name: Lesser Restoration
data.description: End one condition: Blinded, Deafened, Paralyzed, or Poisoned

data.name: Levitate
data.description: Target or object (up to 500 lbs) rises vertically up to 20ft; target cannot move horizontally

data.name: Light
data.description: Touch an object to make it shed bright light in a 20ft radius

data.name: Lightning Arrow
data.description: Next hit deals 4d8 Lightning damage to target and 2d8 to others nearby

data.name: Lightning Bolt
data.description: 8d6 Lightning damage in a 100ft long, 5ft wide line (Dex save)

data.name: Locate Animals Or Plants
data.description: Learn the direction and distance to a specific kind of beast or plant within 5 miles

data.name: Locate Creature
data.description: Learn the direction to a specific creature or kind of creature within 1,000 feet

data.name: Locate Object
data.description: Learn the direction to a specific object you have seen before within 1,000 feet

data.name: Longstrider
data.description: Target's speed increases by 10 feet

data.name: Mage Armor
data.description: Target's AC becomes 13 + Dexterity Mod (if not wearing armor)

data.name: Mage Hand
data.description: Create a spectral hand that can manipulate objects up to 10 lbs

data.name: Magic Circle
data.description: Create a 10ft cylinder that prevents specific creatures (Fey, Fiends, etc.) from entering/leaving

data.name: Magic Jar
data.description: Your soul leaves your body; you can possess other humanoids while your soul is in a container

data.name: Magic Missile
data.description: Create 3 darts that deal 1d4 + 1 Force damage each; darts auto-hit

data.name: Magic Mouth
data.description: Imbue an object to speak a pre-set message (up to 25 words) when a trigger occurs

data.name: Magic Weapon
data.description: A nonmagical weapon becomes a +1 magic weapon

data.name: Major Image
data.description: Create a complex illusion (sight, sound, smell, temperature) in a 20ft cube

data.name: Mass Cure Wounds
data.description: Up to 6 creatures regain 3d8 + Spellcasting Mod HP

data.name: Mass Heal
data.description: Divide a pool of 700 HP of healing among any number of creatures

data.name: Mass Healing Word
data.description: Up to 6 creatures regain 1d4 + Spellcasting Mod HP as a Bonus Action

data.name: Mass Suggestion
data.description: Issue a reasonable request to up to 12 creatures; they follow it for 24 hours (Wis save)

data.name: Maze
data.description: Banish target to a labyrinthine demiplane (no save); target must make Int check to escape

data.name: Meld Into Stone
data.description: Step into a stone object or surface large enough to contain your body

data.name: Melf's Acid Arrow
data.description: 4d4 Acid damage immediately and 2d4 at the end of the target's next turn

data.name: Mending
data.description: Repair a single break or tear in an object (e.g., a broken key, a torn cloak)

data.name: Message
data.description: Point at a creature to whisper a message only they can hear; they can reply in a whisper

data.name: Meteor Swarm
data.description: 20d6 Fire and 20d6 Bludgeoning damage in four 40ft radius spheres (Dex save)

data.name: Mind Blank
data.description: Target is immune to Psychic damage, being Charmed, and all mind-reading

data.name: Mind Sliver
data.description: 1d6 Psychic damage; target subtracts 1d4 from its next saving throw (Int save)

data.name: Mind Spike
data.description: 3d8 Psychic damage; you always know the target's location

data.name: Minor Illusion
data.description: Create a static visual illusion or a specific sound

data.name: Mirage Arcane
data.description: Change an area's appearance significantly, including making structures or difficult terrain

data.name: Mirror Image
data.description: Create 3 duplicates of yourself; attackers might hit a duplicate instead of you

data.name: Mislead
data.description: You become invisible and create an illusory double that you can control

data.name: Misty Step
data.description: Teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see as a Bonus Action

data.name: Modify Memory
data.description: Alter or erase a 10-minute memory from a creature (Wis save)

data.name: Moonbeam
data.description: 2d10 Radiant damage in a 5ft radius cylinder; shapeshifters have Disadvantage on save

data.name: Mordenkainen's Faithful Hound
data.description: Conjure an invisible dog that barks when creatures are near and attacks for 4d8 Piercing

data.name: Mordenkainen's Magnificent Mansion
data.description: Create an extradimensional mansion with food, servants, and space for 100 people

data.name: Mordenkainen's Private Sanctum
data.description: Ward a 100ft cube against sensors, teleportation, and sound

data.name: Mordenkainen's Sword
data.description: Create a floating sword that deals 3d10 Force damage on an attack as a Bonus Action

data.name: Move Earth
data.description: Reshape dirt, sand, or clay over 10-minute intervals (cannot affect stone)

data.name: Nondetection
data.description: Target cannot be targeted by any divination magic or perceived by sensors

data.name: Nystul's Magic Aura
data.description: Change the magical aura of a creature or object to hide or fake its true nature

data.name: Otiluke's Freezing Sphere
data.description: 10d6 Cold damage in a 60ft radius sphere (Con save); freezes water

data.name: Otiluke's Resilient Sphere
data.description: Target is enclosed in a sphere of force; it is protected but cannot affect outside world

data.name: Otto's Irresistible Dance
data.description: Target must dance; it has 0 speed, Disadvantage on Dex saves/attacks; attackers have Adv

data.name: Passwall
data.description: Create a 5ft wide, 8ft high, 20ft deep passage through a wall or floor

data.name: Pass Without Trace
data.description: Allies within 30ft gain +10 bonus to Stealth checks and cannot be tracked by nonmagical means

data.name: Phantasmal Force
data.description: Create a mental illusion that the target believes is real; it can deal 1d6 Psychic

data.name: Phantasmal Killer
data.description: Target is Frightened and takes 4d10 Psychic damage at start of its turns (Wis save)

data.name: Phantom Steed
data.description: Summon an illusory horse with 100ft speed; lasts 1 min if it takes damage

data.name: Planar Ally
data.description: Beseech an extraplanar entity for help; typically requires payment for services

data.name: Planar Binding
data.description: Bind an extraplanar creature to your service for 24 hours (Wis save)

data.name: Plane Shift
data.description: Move yourself and up to 8 others to another plane; or attempt to banish a creature

data.name: Plant Growth
data.description: Make plants overgrow (1/4 speed movement) or enrich soil for double crop yield

data.name: Poison Spray
data.description: 1d12 Poison damage to a creature within 10ft (Con save)

data.name: Polymorph
data.description: Transform a creature into a beast of equal or lower CR/Level (Wis save for unwilling)

data.name: Power Word Fortify
data.description: Give up to 6 creatures 50 Temporary Hit Points

data.name: Power Word Heal
data.description: Target regains all Hit Points and is cured of many conditions (Prone, Stunned, etc.)

data.name: Power Word Kill
data.description: Target with < 100 HP dies instantly

data.name: Power Word Stun
data.description: Target with < 150 HP is Stunned (Con save to end)

data.name: Prayer Of Healing
data.description: Up to 6 creatures regain 2d8 + Spellcasting Mod HP

data.name: Prestidigitation
data.description: Create minor harmless effects (clean/soil items, flavor food, light sparks, small odors)

data.name: Prismatic Spray
data.description: 60ft cone; each creature hit by a random color (e.g., Red deals 10d6 Fire, Indigo petrifies)

data.name: Prismatic Wall
data.description: Shimmering wall with 7 layers; each layer has different damage and status effects

data.name: Produce Flame
data.description: Create a flame in your hand that sheds light or can be thrown for 1d8 Fire

data.name: Programmed Illusion
data.description: Create an illusion that activates and performs a script when a trigger occurs

data.name: Project Image
data.description: Create an illusory copy of yourself that you can see and hear through

data.name: Protection From Energy
data.description: Target gains Resistance to Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder

data.name: Protection From Evil And Good
data.description: Aberrations, Celestials, Fey, Fiends, Undead have Disadvantage to hit target; target immune to Charm/Fright

data.name: Protection From Poison
data.description: Target has Advantage on saves vs. Poison and Resistance to Poison damage

data.name: Purify Food And Drink
data.description: All nonmagical food and drink within 5ft is cleared of poison and disease

data.name: Raise Dead
data.description: Return a creature that died within 10 days to life with 1 HP

data.name: Rary's Telepathic Bond
data.description: Up to 8 creatures can communicate telepathically across any distance on the same plane

data.name: Ray Of Enfeeblement
data.description: Target deals half damage with Strength-based weapon attacks (Con save)

data.name: Ray Of Frost
data.description: 1d8 Cold damage; target's speed is reduced by 10ft

data.name: Ray Of Sickness
data.description: 2d8 Poison damage and target is Poisoned (Con save)

data.name: Regenerate
data.description: Target regains 4d8+15 HP, then 1 HP every turn; severed limbs regrow

data.name: Reincarnate
data.description: Touch a piece of a dead creature to grow it a new, random body of a different race

data.name: Remove Curse
data.description: All curses on an object or creature end

data.name: Resistance
data.description: Target adds 1d4 to one saving throw of its choice

data.name: Resurrection
data.description: Return a creature that died within 100 years to life; restores all body parts

data.name: Reverse Gravity
data.description: Gravity reverses in a 50ft radius, 100ft high cylinder; targets fall "up" (Dex save to grab)

data.name: Revivify
data.description: Return a creature that died in the last minute to life with 1 HP

data.name: Rope Trick
data.description: Rope stands vertically; climb to an extradimensional space that can hold 8 people

data.name: Sacred Flame
data.description: 1d8 Radiant damage; ignores cover (Dex save)

data.name: Sanctuary
data.description: Enemies must pass a Wis save to attack the target; fails if the target attacks

data.name: Scorching Ray
data.description: Create 3 rays dealing 2d6 Fire damage each

data.name: Scrying
data.description: See and hear a particular creature on the same plane (Wis save)

data.name: Searing Smite
data.description: Next hit deals +1d6 Fire; target takes 1d6 Fire each turn until it passes save

data.name: See Invisibility
data.description: You see invisible creatures and objects as if they were visible

data.name: Seeming
data.description: Change the appearance of any number of creatures you can see

data.name: Sending
data.description: Send a 25-word message to a creature you know anywhere

data.name: Sequester
data.description: Target becomes invisible and enters state of suspended animation until a condition is met

data.name: Shapechange
data.description: Transform into any creature with CR up to your level; retain your mental stats

data.name: Shatter
data.description: 3d8 Thunder damage in 10ft radius; inorganic creatures have Disadvantage on save

data.name: Shield
data.description: +5 AC and immunity to Magic Missile as a reaction

data.name: Shield Of Faith
data.description: Target gains +2 bonus to AC

data.name: Shillelagh
data.description: A club or staff uses your spellcasting ability for attacks and deals 1d8 damage

data.name: Shining Smite
data.description: Next hit deals +2d6 Radiant; target sheds light and cannot be invisible

data.name: Shocking Grasp
data.description: 1d8 Lightning damage; target cannot take Reactions; Adv vs metal armor

data.name: Silence
data.description: 20ft sphere; no sound can pass through; creatures are Deafened; no verbal spells

data.name: Silent Image
data.description: Create a visual illusion of an object or creature in a 15ft cube

data.name: Simulacrum
data.description: Create an icy duplicate of a beast or humanoid with half its HP

data.name: Sleep
data.description: Roll 5d8; creatures with total HP equal to or less than the roll fall Unconscious

data.name: Sleet Storm
data.description: 40ft radius; heavily obscured, difficult terrain, and creatures fall Prone (Dex save)

data.name: Slow
data.description: Up to 6 targets have half speed, -2 AC/Dex saves, and can only take 1 action (Wis save)

data.name: Sorcerous Burst
data.description: 1d8 damage of a chosen type; if you roll an 8, roll another d8 and add it

data.name: Spare The Dying
data.description: Stabilize a creature that has 0 Hit Points

data.name: Speak With Animals
data.description: You can communicate with beasts for the duration

data.name: Speak With Dead
data.description: Ask a corpse up to 5 questions; it only knows what it knew in life

data.name: Speak With Plants
data.description: Communicate with plants; can turn difficult terrain into normal or vice versa

data.name: Spider Climb
data.description: Target can move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and ceilings

data.name: Spike Growth
data.description: 20ft radius difficult terrain; creatures take 2d4 Piercing for every 5ft moved

data.name: Spirit Guardians
data.description: Spirits circle you in 15ft radius; 3d8 Radiant or Necrotic; speed halved (Wis save)

data.name: Spiritual Weapon
data.description: Floating weapon attacks for 1d8 + Spellcasting Mod as a Bonus Action

data.name: Staggering Smite
data.description: Next hit deals +4d6 Psychic; target has Disadvantage on attacks/checks (Wis save)

data.name: Starry Wisp
data.description: 1d8 Radiant damage; target emits dim light and cannot benefit from invisibility

data.name: Steel Wind Strike
data.description: Make 5 melee spell attacks against 5 targets within 30ft; each deals 6d10 Force

data.name: Stinking Cloud
data.description: 20ft radius fog; creatures must pass Con save or spend their action retching

data.name: Stone Shape
data.description: Reshape a Medium or smaller piece of stone into a new form (e.g., a door or a coffer)

data.name: Stone Skin
data.description: Target has Resistance to nonmagical Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage

data.name: Storm Of Vengeance
data.description: Create a massive storm dealing Thunder, Acid, Lightning, and Cold over 10 rounds

data.name: Suggestion
data.description: Influence a creature to follow a course of action you describe (Wis save)

data.name: Summon Aberration
data.description: Summon an Aberrant Spirit (Beholderkin, Slaad, or Star Spawn)

data.name: Summon Beast
data.description: Summon a Bestial Spirit (Air, Land, or Water)

data.name: Summon Celestial
data.description: Summon a Celestial Spirit (Avenger or Defender)

data.name: Summon Construct
data.description: Summon a Construct Spirit (Clay, Metal, or Stone)

data.name: Summon Dragon
data.description: Summon a Draconic Spirit; choose a damage type based on dragon breath

data.name: Summon Elemental
data.description: Summon an Elemental Spirit (Air, Earth, Fire, or Water)

data.name: Summon Fey
data.description: Summon a Fey Spirit (Fuming, Mirthful, or Tricksy)

data.name: Summon Fiend
data.description: Summon a Fiendish Spirit (Demon, Devil, or Yugoloth)

data.name: Summon Undead
data.description: Summon an Undead Spirit (Ghostly, Putrid, or Skeletal)

data.name: Sunbeam
data.description: 60ft line of light; 6d8 Radiant and Blinded (Con save); repeatable each turn

data.name: Sunburst
data.description: 12d6 Radiant and Blinded in a 60ft radius (Con save)

data.name: Swift Quiver
data.description: Quiver produces infinite ammo; you can make 2 ranged attacks as a Bonus Action

data.name: Symbol
data.description: Inscribe a trap with various effects (Death, Fear, Hopelessness, Pain, Sleep, Stunning)

data.name: Synaptic Static
data.description: 8d6 Psychic in 20ft radius; failed Int save subtracts 1d6 from attacks/saves

data.name: Tasha's Bubbling Cauldron
data.description: Create a cauldron that produces magical potions for you and your allies

data.name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
data.description: Target falls Prone and is Incapacitated with laughter (Wis save)

data.name: Telekinesis
data.description: Move creatures or objects up to 1,000 lbs; contest target's Strength with your check

data.name: Telepathy
data.description: Form a telepathic link with a creature you know on the same plane

data.name: Teleport
data.description: Teleport yourself and up to 8 others to a location you know

data.name: Teleportation Circle
data.description: Link your current circle to a permanent circle you know the sigils for

data.name: Tenser's Floating Disk
data.description: Create a floating disk that follows you and carries up to 500 lbs

data.name: Thaumaturgy
data.description: Create minor wonders (boom of thunder, change eye color, harmless tremors)

data.name: Thorn Whip
data.description: 1d6 Piercing; pull target 10ft toward you

data.name: Thunderclap
data.description: 1d6 Thunder damage to all creatures within 5ft

data.name: Thunderous Smite
data.description: Next hit deals +2d6 Thunder and pushes target 10ft away (Str save)

data.name: Thunderwave
data.description: 2d8 Thunder damage in 15ft cube; pushes creatures 10ft away

data.name: Time Stop
data.description: Take 1d4 + 1 extra turns immediately

data.name: Toll The Dead
data.description: 1d8 Necrotic; increases to 1d12 if the target is missing any Hit Points

data.name: Tongues
data.description: Target can understand and speak any spoken language

data.name: Transport Via Plants
data.description: Step into one plant and exit out of another on the same plane

data.name: Tree Stride
data.description: Move from one tree to another as long as they are the same species

data.name: True Polymorph
data.description: Transform target into a creature, object, or vice versa; permanent if concentration held

data.name: True Resurrection
data.description: Return a creature that died within 200 years to life; creates a new body if needed

data.name: True Seeing
data.description: See things as they truly are; see through illusions, see into Ethereal Plane

data.name: True Strike
data.description: Use spellcasting ability for a weapon attack; deals extra Radiant damage at higher levels

data.name: Tsunami
data.description: Create a 300ft high wall of water; deals 6d10 Bludgeoning and sweeps creatures away

data.name: Unseen Servant
data.description: Create an invisible force that performs simple tasks (e.g., pouring wine, folding clothes)

data.name: Vampiric Touch
data.description: Deal 3d6 Necrotic on hit and regain HP equal to half the damage dealt

data.name: Vicious Mockery
data.description: 1d4 Psychic damage; target has Disadvantage on its next attack roll (Wis save)

data.name: Vitriolic Sphere
data.description: 10d4 Acid damage immediately and 5d4 at the end of its next turn

data.name: Wall Of Fire
data.description: Create a wall dealing 5d8 Fire damage to those who enter or start their turn near it

data.name: Wall Of Force
data.description: Create an invisible, indestructible wall that cannot be passed by physical means or magic

data.name: Wall Of Ice
data.description: Create a wall dealing 10d6 Cold; if broken, it leaves a frigid air dealing 5d6 Cold

data.name: Wall Of Stone
data.description: Create a wall of solid stone that becomes permanent if concentration is held for 10 mins

data.name: Wall Of Thorns
data.description: Create a wall of brush dealing 7d8 Piercing on entry; movement is 1/4 speed

data.name: Warding Bond
data.description: You and an ally share damage; target gets +1 AC and Resistance to all damage

data.name: Water Breathing
data.description: Up to 10 willing creatures can breathe underwater

data.name: Water Walk
data.description: Up to 10 willing creatures can walk across water, acid, mud, or lava

data.name: Web
data.description: 20ft cube of webs; area is difficult terrain and Restrains creatures (Dex save)

data.name: Weird
data.description: Up to any number of creatures in 30ft radius take 4d10 Psychic and are Frightened

data.name: Wind Walk
data.description: Up to 10 creatures turn into cloud-like forms with 300ft fly speed

data.name: Wind Wall
data.description: Wall of wind deals 3d8 Bludgeoning and deflects arrows and small creatures

data.name: Wish
data.description: Alter reality; duplicate any spell of 8th level or lower or create custom effects

data.name: Witch Bolt
data.description: 1d12 Lightning; as an Action each turn, automatically deal 1d12 damage

data.name: Word Of Radiance
data.description: 1d6 Radiant damage to all chosen creatures within 5ft

data.name: Word Of Recall
data.description: You and up to 5 others teleport to a previously designated sanctuary

data.name: Wrathful Smite
data.description: Next hit deals +1d6 Psychic; target is Frightened (Wis save)

data.name: Yolande's Regal Presence
data.description: 30ft aura; enemies take 4d6 Force and are pushed 15ft away/knocked Prone

data.name: Zone Of Truth
data.description: Creatures in 15ft radius cannot speak a deliberate lie (Wis save)
